directions: Combine all ingredients except peppers; spoon into peppers.
Place, filled-sides up, on baking sheet.
Bake 10 min. or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 1/2 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 cup KRAFT Mexican Style Shredded Four Cheese with a Touch of PHILADELPHIA
4 slices OSCAR MAYER Bacon, cooked, crumbled
18 jalapeno peppers, cut lengthwise in half, seeds and membranes removed
title: Cheese and Bacon Jalapeno Rellenos
